A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: OK. I'm not a fan of the last few but this one especially. What has happened to the clever banter\, the charming characters\, and well thought out story arcs. CGI\, Fluffy characters\, and good visuals don't for a good story make. Uuuurgh Disney\, you screwed up. It's gotten progressively worse but this is an all time 'meh'.
